.. _apptainer_plugin_install:

apptainer plugin install
------------------------

Install a compiled Apptainer plugin

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'plugin install' command installs the compiled plugin found at plugin_path
  into the appropriate directory on the host.

::

  apptainer plugin install <plugin_path>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer plugin install $HOME/apptainer/test-plugin/test-plugin.sif

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for install

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer plugin <apptainer_plugin>` 	 - Manage Apptainer plugins
